i18n.key: The specified component (ID=%id%) is not a valid topic because it is of type ″%type%″.
The specified component (ID=%id%) is not a valid ″website″ topic because it is of type ″%type%″.
The page reference is not valid (ID=%id%).
The specified tag ″%tag%″ is not valid.
The specified language ″%lang%″ is not valid.
The specified tag ″%tag%″ must be an exclusive tag.
No page reference seems to match the required criteria: pageRef=″%pageRef%″, tags: primary=″%primaryTag%″, secondary=″%secondaryTag%″.
No index page found for the ″%topicId%: %topicLabel%″ topic.
The specified ID is not a valid: ″%id%″.
The referenced document (ID=″{id}″) is not a valid page.
The specified URL (″{url}″) is not valid: %message%
The specified component (ID=″{id}″) is not a valid page reference.
The specified URL ″{url}″ cannot be applied to the reference page ″{pageRef}″ because it seems to be already in use by another page.
The specified page name (″{pageName}″) does not match any page names.
No page identifier specified.
The specified page identifier (ID=″{param}″) is not used by any valid page.
The page declaration (″{param}″ file) is invalid.
The requested page (ID=″{param}″) is not available.
The blocks declaration (″{param}″ file) is invalid.
The content declaration (″{param}″ file) is invalid.
The requested page is not the index for the group (ID=″{param}″).
